definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to teach/to be a teacher/to train/to coach
to dispute/to disagree/to argue opinionatedly/to wrangle
to work in a profession (e.g. doctor, lawyer)/practitioner/professional
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
to be strongly attached to/to be dedicated/to cling to
to be determined to/to insist on

sentences.english: Lin Lei saw the opportunity to ridicule Bai righteousness, want him to hold.
sentences.chinese: 林磊看准机会乘机奚落柏义，要他来执筹码。

sentences.english: They are controlled by means of practice and non-attachment.
sentences.chinese: 通过修行和不执可以控制它们。

sentences.english: This project will be performed in three years.
Therefore, in order to completely eradicate the attitude of self-clinging, one needs to practice absolute bodhicitta.
sentences.chinese: 因此为彻底消除我执，我们必须修持胜义菩提心。

sentences.english: Shall I hold the flagstick for you?
An ox is taken by the horns , and a man by the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 牛因角长而被执，人因失言而陷身。

sentences.english: After teaching for ten years he moved into publishing.
sentences.chinese: 执桝十年后他干起了出版工作。

sentences.english: The third week will show you your ego's need for importance.
sentences.chinese: 第三周你会看到我执的需求便是想壮大自己。

sentences.english: Don t let a little dispute injure a great friendship.
sentences.chinese: 不要让晓晓帝聩执损伤一份伟大地友情。

sentences.english: There is a fallacy which I shall call the ' essentialist fallacy'.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个我称之为“实有执”的谬论。

sentences.english: But Europe could soon take the top spot on the space junk tally.
sentences.chinese: 不过欧洲在太空垃圾排行榜上即将“执头把交椅”。

sentences.english: American business and industry outpaced the world for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 美国的工商业一直执世界经济之牛耳。

sentences.english: "Moderation" is the ideal state of curriculum management.
sentences.chinese: “执中”是课程管理的理想境界。

sentences.english: Fifthly, consultations should be better organised to improve the Council’s efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 加强协商，提高执理会效率。

sentences.english: Before I came to CTTB, I had been teaching for 17 years in Malaysia.
sentences.chinese: 在这之前，我在马来西亚也执了十七年的教鞭。

sentences.english: Roller- blading is very popular among young people in the city.
sentences.chinese: 滚轴溜冰在这个城市非常受年青人的执捧。

definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津
abbr. for Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] in central China/surname E
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
happy/carefree/at one's ease/variant of 預|预[yu4]/old variant of 與|与[yu4]
abbr. for Henan province 河南 in central China
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
